duties_responsibilities.duty: Take charge of the books, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, monthly closing, and cash reporting.
Supervise AP invoice entry, reconcile and pay all vendors within terms.
Maintain customer billing and accounts receivable.
Prepare monthly bank reconciliations and record bank cash transfers and miscellaneous account activity.
Prepare and file multiple state tax returns and maintain a monthly book closing and reporting schedule.
Generate financial packets and communicate with owners and executive management about financial results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
